Description: Ostracon, large section (two fragments joined) of the body of a drab-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse, the exterior is covered with a grey-brown slip and remains of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thot 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394957) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394957)
